contest-event.event-date:
June 20, 2015 D West of England Bandsmen's Festival (Championship Section)
West of England Bandsmen's Festival (Championship Section) 1 Test Piece Contest West of England Bandsmen's Festival (Bugle) west-of-england-bandsmans-festival-class-a
Sinfonietta for Brass Band - The Wayfarer
Molinnis Park, Bugle, Cornwall, England, UK Hymn - "Crimond" arr. Goff Richards: 1. Camborne Town, 48 2. Regional Brass Band Bern, 46 3. St Austell Town, 45 4. Lanner & District, 44 5. Mount Charles, 43 6. St Dennis, 41
Best Player: Francesca Bazeley, St Dennis Best Soprano: Mark Harrison, Mount Charles Best Solo Cornet: Demelza Sturges, Camborne Best Solo Horn: Francesca Bazeley, St Dennis Best Solo Euphonium: Kim Bazeley, St Dennis Best Set of Basses: Camborne Town
Oct. 6, 2014, 9:32 a.m. Sept. 9, 2015, 6:43 p.m.
1 Camborne Town Band John Berryman
2 St. Dennis Band Darren Hawken
3 St. Austell Town Band Melvin White
4 Mount Charles Brass Band Simon Badge
5 Regional Brass Band Bern Jonathan Kowszun
6 Lanner and District Silver Band Stuart Chappell
